    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    A class to handle the GUI of the game
    Bonus
    A class to store the bonus tiles of the game
    Dice
    A class to imitate a dice roll
    EndGame
    A class handling the end of the game when no player has won
    GameController
    A class to connect the GUI with the game logic
    GameLogic
    The brain of the game, handling all the logic
    Main
    The main class to start the game
    Player
    A class to store the players of the game
    PlayerIcon
    A class to store the icon's corresponding to the players of the game
    PlayerWon
    A class handling a player winning
    Setup
    A class handling the setup of a new game or loading an old one
    Tile
    A class responsible for storing the tiles
    TradeWindow
    A class handling the trading
